channel.title: Lots of these topics are around
channel.description:
Lots of these topics are around
It is about girls. In this case, I am not really serious about this chick. [size=20pt]I am not asking advice[/size]
Okay, here is how it goes. About a month ago, I made a bet with this lesbian in my class that I would be able to nail a chick by the end of the year. Now, I think my chance has come up, there is this girl, who used to go out with one of my old friends (a complete dick). Now, she is like flirting with me, and saying to the guy that I'm going out with her and shit...
For the lulz, I will go up to her tomorrow and ask her "Yo. Wanna know what will really piss your ex off? Lets have sex."
I will see what she says. What's your opinion? Am I taking advantage of a situation?

who says it has to be recent

runescape3dude:

runescape3dude:

I will see what she says. What’s your opinion? Am I taking advantage of a situation?

wikipedia:

Advice is a form of relating personal opinions, belief systems, personal values and recommendations about certain situations relayed in some context to another person, group or party often offered as a guide to action and/or conduct.

item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

Drunkard18:

At the moment, it seems the only ally you have in this war against your virginity is alcohol, use it to your advantage, also, i highly doubt that line will work, also, by the way you are talking about sex and her, it seems you are young, and i believe you shouldn’t be fuckin w/ this chick, unless she is hot and you’re alright with it.

I asked her. She said yes. I backed off… I do not trust her. I do not even remember agreeing to go out with her, no, I was not under the influence of any drugs.
